data.question: What is the formula of potassium o-nitrophenolate?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of [(THF)4{K(o-O2N-C6H4-O)4Er}4]n?
Is the compound H18[Tm14(µ-η2-o-O2N-C6H4-O)8(η2-o-O2N-C6H4-O)16(µ4-O)2(µ3-O)16] synthesized under air?
What is the coordination number of terbium in [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
Does the synthesis of [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm, Eu) result in infinite layers?
What is the crystal system of the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
Is the compound [(THF)4{K(o-O2N-C6H4-O)4Ln}4]n (Ln = Y, Er, Lu) obtained by crystallization under air?
What is the role of n-pentane in the synthesis of [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
data.answer: Layered on top of the solution for crystallization

data.question: What is the IR peak (cm-1) associated with the C-NO2 group in the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
Is the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm, Eu) synthesized using a 5:1 molar ratio of potassium o-nitrophenolate to lanthanide trichlorides?
What is the space group of the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
Does the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm, Eu) have a more open structure compared to [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
What is the method used for the synthesis of potassium o-nitrophenolate?
data.answer: Reaction of o-nitrophenole with tBuOK in boiling THF

data.question: Is the compound [(THF)4{K(o-O2N-C6H4-O)4Ln}4]n (Ln = Y, Er, Lu) characterized by single-crystal X-ray diffraction?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of H18[Ln14(µ-η2-o-O2N-C6H4-O)8(η2-o-O2N-C6H4-O)16(µ4-O)2(µ3-O)16] (Ln = Dy)?
What is the role of THF in the synthesis of [(THF)4{K(o-O2N-C6H4-O)4Ln}4]n?
Is the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm, Eu) obtained by crystallization from THF/n-pentane?
What is the coordination environment of potassium in [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Tb]n?
What is the crystallographic space group of the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm)?
Does the compound [K2(o-O2N-C6H4-O)5Ln]n (Ln = Sm, Eu) feature channels through the layers?
